https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dC2vkjnwhMOm79J5NVUbaFKhimv.jpg About the extraordinary doctors and activists—including Paul Farmer, Jim Yong Kim, and Ophelia Dahl—whose work 30 years ago to save lives in a rural Haitian village grew into a global battle in the halls of power for the right to health for all. Bending the Arc
